thread.title: Amy Schumer kicks heckler from gig
thread.title_full: Amy Schumer kicks heckler from gig

title: Amy Schumer kicks heckler from gig
text:
'Trainwreck' review: Amy Schumer comedy has big laughs and lots of heart 
Comedian Amy Schumer turned on a heckler during a stand-up show in California on Sunday, and kicked the woman out of the venue. 
Fresh off her Saturday Night Live hosting gig in New York, Schumer flew across the country to perform at the Funny Or Die Oddball Comedy Festival in Irvine. She was talking about her "dream come true" SNL debut when an audience member started yelling at her. 
Schumer warned the lady to stop heckling and when she continued to speak out, the Trainwreck star asked security to escort the woman and her friend out of the venue. 
Fans applauded as the unruly audience member and her guest left the gig. 
The rest of Schumer's stand-up show went without a hitch. Sponsored Links
